mapper.sql: SPU_ID, CLASSIFICATION_ID, BRAND_ID, SPU_NAME, SPU_TYPE, `STATUS`, DEPTH01_ID, DEPTH02_ID, DEPTH03_ID, DEPTH01_NAME, DEPTH02_NAME, DEPTH03_NAME, MAIN_IMAGE_01, MAIN_IMAGE_02, MAIN_IMAGE_03, SUB_IMAGE_01, SUB_IMAGE_02, SUB_IMAGE_03, SUB_IMAGE_04, SUB_IMAGE_05, OPTION01, OPTION02, OPTION03, OPTION04, OPTION05, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME
mapper.insert: insert into TB_SPU (SPU_ID, CLASSIFICATION_ID, BRAND_ID, SPU_NAME, SPU_TYPE, `STATUS`, DEPTH01_ID, DEPTH02_ID, DEPTH03_ID, DEPTH01_NAME, DEPTH02_NAME, DEPTH03_NAME, MAIN_IMAGE_01, MAIN_IMAGE_02, MAIN_IMAGE_03, SUB_IMAGE_01, SUB_IMAGE_02, SUB_IMAGE_03, SUB_IMAGE_04, SUB_IMAGE_05, OPTION01, OPTION02, OPTION03, OPTION04, OPTION05, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{spuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{classificationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{spuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depth01Id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{depth02Id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{depth03Id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{depth01Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depth02Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depth03Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainImage01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainImage02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainImage03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subImage01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subImage02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subImage03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subImage04,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subImage05,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option04,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{option05,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update TB_SPU
CLASSIFICATION_ID = #{classificationId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BRAND_ID = #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SPU_NAME = #{spuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SPU_TYPE = #{spuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`STATUS` = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPTH01_ID = #{depth01Id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DEPTH02_ID = #{depth02Id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DEPTH03_ID = #{depth03Id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DEPTH01_NAME = #{depth01Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPTH02_NAME = #{depth02Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPTH03_NAME = #{depth03Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAIN_IMAGE_01 = #{mainImage01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAIN_IMAGE_02 = #{mainImage02,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAIN_IMAGE_03 = #{mainImage03,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUB_IMAGE_01 = #{subImage01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUB_IMAGE_02 = #{subImage02,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUB_IMAGE_03 = #{subImage03,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUB_IMAGE_04 = #{subImage04,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUB_IMAGE_05 = #{subImage05,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION01 = #{option01,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION02 = #{option02,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION03 = #{option03,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION04 = #{option04,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTION05 = #{option05,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = now()
where SPU_ID = #{spuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update TB_SPU set CLASSIFICATION_ID = #{classificationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BRAND_ID = #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SPU_NAME = #{spuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPU_TYPE = #{spuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `STATUS` = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPTH01_ID = #{depth01Id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEPTH02_ID = #{depth02Id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEPTH03_ID = #{depth03Id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEPTH01_NAME = #{depth01Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPTH02_NAME = #{depth02Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPTH03_NAME = #{depth03Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAIN_IMAGE_01 = #{mainImage01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAIN_IMAGE_02 = #{mainImage02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAIN_IMAGE_03 = #{mainImage03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUB_IMAGE_01 = #{subImage01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUB_IMAGE_02 = #{subImage02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUB_IMAGE_03 = #{subImage03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUB_IMAGE_04 = #{subImage04,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUB_IMAGE_05 = #{subImage05,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION01 = #{option01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION02 = #{option02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION03 = #{option03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION04 = #{option04,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION05 = #{option05,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = now() where SPU_ID = #{spuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER() AS RN ,T1.SPU_ID ,T1.CLASSIFICATION_ID ,(SELECT A1.CLASSIFICATION_NAME FROM TB_CLASSIFICATION A1 WHERE A1.CLASSIFICATION_ID = T1.CLASSIFICATION_ID) AS CLASSIFICATION_NAME ,T1.BRAND_ID ,T1.SPU_NAME ,T1.SPU_TYPE ,T1.STATUS ,CASE WHEN T1.STATUS = 1 THEN '使用中' WHEN T1.STATUS = 0 THEN '禁用' ELSE '-' END AS STATUS_NAME ,T1.DEPTH01_ID ,T1.DEPTH02_ID ,T1.DEPTH03_ID ,T1.DEPTH01_NAME ,T1.DEPTH02_NAME ,T1.DEPTH03_NAME ,T1.MAIN_IMAGE_01 ,T1.MAIN_IMAGE_02 ,T1.MAIN_IMAGE_03 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_01 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_02 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_03 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_04 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_05 ,T1.OPTION01 ,T1.OPTION02 ,T1.OPTION03 ,T1.OPTION04 ,T1.OPTION05 ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS CREATE_TIME ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS UPDATE_TIME FROM TB_SPU T1

SELECT T1.SPU_ID ,T1.CLASSIFICATION_ID ,T1.BRAND_ID ,T1.SPU_NAME ,T1.SPU_TYPE ,T1.STATUS ,CASE WHEN T1.STATUS = 1 THEN '使用中' WHEN T1.STATUS = 0 THEN '禁用' ELSE '-' END AS STATUS_NAME ,T1.DEPTH01_ID ,T1.DEPTH02_ID ,T1.DEPTH03_ID ,T1.DEPTH01_NAME ,T1.DEPTH02_NAME ,T1.DEPTH03_NAME ,T1.MAIN_IMAGE_01 ,T1.MAIN_IMAGE_02 ,T1.MAIN_IMAGE_03 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_01 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_02 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_03 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_04 ,T1.SUB_IMAGE_05 ,T1.OPTION01 ,T1.OPTION02 ,T1.OPTION03 ,T1.OPTION04 ,T1.OPTION05 ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS CREATE_TIME ,DATE_FORMAT(T1.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS UPDATE_TIME FROM TB_SPU T1 WHERE T1.SPU_ID = #{spuId}
